function.name: redirect_to_healthcare_professional
function.description: Redirect user to appropriate healthcare professional when they need prescriptions, medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment recommendations. Provides contact information for doctors, pharmacists, urgent care, telemedicine, and emergency services.

query_type.description: Type of healthcare need: 'prescription' for new/refill prescriptions, 'medical_advice' for diagnosis/treatment questions, 'emergency' for urgent medical situations, 'general' for other healthcare questions

urgency.description: Urgency level of the healthcare need
